title: Thiago Carvalho
text: Thiago Carvalho de Oliveira (born 24 June 1988 in <a href="Rio%20Verde%2C%20Goi%C3%A1s">Rio Verde</a>), known as Thiago Carvalho, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a> and former player who played as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29%23Centre-back">central defender</a>. He is the current manager of <a href="Associa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20Atl%C3%A9tica%20Aparecidense">Aparecidense</a>.
